descriptions:
Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths, the perfect addition to your holiday decor! This set includes 1 lighted wreath, 2 garlands with lights, 2 red bows, and 1 metal hanger, providing you with everything you need to create a festive atmosphere.

Crafted with care, the wreaths are made of PE synthetic fir, ensuring durability and a realistic look. The warm yellow LED lights add a cozy glow to your space, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. Powered by batteries, these wreaths are convenient and easy to use.

The garland measures 106 inches in length, with a diameter of 10 inches and 315 branch tips. The wreath itself has a diameter of 17.72 inches, while the red bows have a width of 23.6 inches and a height of 13.8 inches. These dimensions make the wreaths and bows the perfect size to hang on your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, and shelves.

The wreaths are adorned with charming decor elements such as pine cones and red berries, adding a touch of nature and elegance to your holiday display. The garland is also embellished with LED lights, providing a magical sparkle to any space. The included red bows add a festive and traditional touch.

These Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths are ideal for various occasions and settings. Perfect for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties, they bring the joy and spirit of the season wherever they are placed. Whether you hang them on your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves, these wreaths will instantly elevate your holiday decor.

Don't miss out on the opportunity to transform your space into a winter wonderland with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Order now and make this holiday season truly magical!

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This set includes a beautifully crafted wreath, two garlands with lights, two red bows, and a metal hanger. 

The wreath is made with high-quality PE synthetic fir material, giving it a realistic appearance. It measures approximately 17.72 inches in diameter and is adorned with festive pine cones and red berries, adding a touch of elegance to your holiday decorations.

The garlands are perfect for adding a warm and inviting glow to your home. Each garland measures 106 inches in length and 10 inches in diameter, with a total of 315 branch tips. The garlands are embellished with LED lights, creating a charming ambiance in any space.

The set also includes two red bows, measuring 23.6 inches in width and 13.8 inches in height. These bows add a pop of color and can be easily attached to wreaths, garlands, or other decorations.

Powered by batteries, these Christmas wreaths and garlands are convenient to use and can be placed anywhere without the need for a power outlet. The warm yellow LED lights create a cozy atmosphere, perfect for celebrating the holiday season.

The Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths is versatile and can be used in various locations. Whether you want to decorate your front door, fireplace, Christmas tree, mantel, porch, cabinets, or shelves, these wreaths and garlands will add a festive touch to any space.

Ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties, this set is a must-have for anyone looking to create a warm and inviting holiday atmosphere. Don't miss out on this opportunity to elevate your Christmas decorations with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths!

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! This festive set includes everything you need to add a touch of holiday cheer to your home or office. Perfect for Christmas, these wreaths are designed to bring joy and warmth to any space.

Each set includes 1 lighted wreath, 2 garlands with lights, 2 red bows, and 1 metal hanger. The wreath is made of PE synthetic fir, giving it a realistic and natural appearance. The warm yellow LED lights add a cozy glow to your decorations.

These wreaths are battery operated, ensuring hassle-free setup and allowing you to place them anywhere without worrying about power outlets. The garland measures 106 inches in length, with a diameter of 10 inches and 315 branch tips. The wreath itself has a diameter of 17.72 inches, providing a full and lush look. The red bows measure 23.6 inches in width and 13.8 inches in height, making them a striking addition to your decorations.

The wreaths come adorned with pine cones and red berries, adding a lovely touch of nature to your holiday decor. The garlands are also embellished with LED lights, creating a captivating display. These wreaths are ideal for front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. They can be placed in homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, or even used as eye-catching decorations for Christmas parties.

Don't miss out on this amazing Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Bring the magic of the holiday season to your space with these beautiful and versatile decorations.

Introducing the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths! Deck your halls and spread the holiday cheer with this stunning set of wreaths that will add a festive touch to any space.

Each set includes:
- 1 Lighted Wreath: Crafted with PE synthetic fir, this wreath features a beautiful poinsettia design and is adorned with pine cones and red berries. It is also equipped with warm yellow LED lights, creating a cozy and inviting ambiance. 
- 2 Garlands with Lights: These garlands, measuring 106 inches in length and 10 inches in diameter, are perfect for draping along staircases, mantels, or doorways. They are embellished with LED lights, adding a magical glow to your decor.
- 2 Red Bows: Add an elegant touch to your wreaths or garlands with these vibrant red bows. They measure 23.6 inches in width and 13.8 inches in height, making them a delightful addition to your holiday decorations.
- 1 Metal Hanger: Hang your wreath with ease using the included metal hanger.

Powered by batteries, these decorations are convenient and can be placed anywhere without the need for a nearby power outlet. They are suitable for a variety of spaces and occasions, including front doors, fireplaces, Christmas trees, mantels, porches, cabinets, and shelves. 

Made with high-quality materials, including PE synthetic fir for the wreaths and warm yellow LED lights, this set is designed to last for many holiday seasons to come. It is ideal for homes, shops, hotels, living rooms, and Christmas parties.

Make this Christmas extra special with the Yingzhao Set of 5 Poinsettia Christmas Wreaths. Order yours now and transform your space into a winter wonderland!
